short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Friday-fies the days of the week on every site you visit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Friday-fy extension instantly converts the days of the week on any site you visit into the Friday-fied version of the days of the week. Why? The better question to ask is, "Why not?"

Thanks to Marcus Connor for the Checkbox Rocker Toggle CSS!
(https://codepen.io/marcusconnor/pen/QJNvMa)
